headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights ArcelorMittal, Steel Dynamics and Companhia Siderurgica Nacional
summary: Zacks highlights ArcelorMittal, Steel Dynamics, and Companhia Siderurgica Nacional as key steel producers positioned to withstand pricing pressures through strategic expansion, operational efficiency, and market diversification.
